title: "Jewish Healthcare Foundation grants benefit vision, teen programs"
excerpt: "The Jewish Healthcare Foundation is providing more than a half million dollars in grants to two Pittsbugh-based programs, one that will bolster artificial intelligence use in the treatment of blindness and the other to foster mental health in teenagers."
